section.name: Fill date in Document
section.span: How to fill a date field in a document.

div.p: Filling in the 'Date of Happening' for the document 'multibazaar2008'. The time is typed in. AM or PM is chosen from the little pull down menu and the date can be typed in, but can also be chosen from the calender, which appears after clicking the little calendar button.

section.p: Open the document for editing. In a date field, type the date and time. The date can also be chosen from a calendar and AM/PM is chosen from a little pull down menu.
